discussion.p: Table 82 in section 27 mentions the header <cstdlib> for String streams () and the headers <cstdio> and <cwchar> for File streams (). It's not clear why these headers are mentioned in this context since they do not define any of the library entities described by the subclauses. According to , only such headers are to be listed in the summary.

resolution.note: Copenhagen: changed the proposed resolution slightly. The original proposed resolution also said to remove <cstdio> from Table 82. However, <cstdio> is mentioned several times within section , including .
